QuestData.Title: The Life Spring
QuestData.Description: It sounds like these... "dwarves"... you found managed to steal a powerful botani artifact.$b$bBut the fools didn't know they need a special water to power it.$b$bTo the north is a well along the Evermorn Rise.$b$bThere you will find a guardian, a creature of water we have named Utrophis.$b$bSlay it and take its essence and you will be one step closer to claiming the power of the botani and their genesaur.
QuestData.RewardText: The Waters of Utrophis. I have never held or smelled or tasted it before. But I have heard many stories, many legends.$b$bI was expecting something more grand.
